ygData.subject: Proc'ing; Dex vrs Wis (was Bard PvP)
ygData.msgSnippet: Finally, after a loooong back-and-forth battle, the difference was made when he put on his Savant s Cap.  That little bit of extra Wisdom helpped make
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Finally, after a loooong back-and-forth battle, the difference was
made when he put on his Savant's Cap. That little bit of extra Wisdom
helpped make his PGT a proc'ing machine.
<unsnip>

I could have sworn that DEX was the stat that helped a proc'ing
weapon. Is it wisdom or dex???? (If it's wisdom then I'll never
bother with proc's, my wisdom is very low and all my items are
targeted at adding to str, agl, dex, and cha. I'd need to grow a
couple of extra arms to wear the wisdom stuff.... :P )

Bujold (the foolish bard)
Xegony
